root.name: Voxatron
root.description: Voxatron is an arena shooter set in a completely destructible voxel world. The game is developed for PC, Mac, and Linux by Lexaloffle.The game features:An Adventure and Arcade modePlayback and post-game recording abilityCustom rendering with soft shadowsBuilt-in music and sound synthesizerA level creator and user made level browserVoxatron is currently in alpha and can be bought now to get immediate access.Adventure Mode has the player collecting keys and progressing through different environments and encountering different enemies.Arcade mode is set in one arena and is wave based. Currently, only local high scores are competed against.
